title: Why are keyless entry cars easy to break into? - Quora

response.answer_text: Locks and thieves ... a race without end. In old times, a car to be stolen a basic tool was needed. Almost anyone with little will and knowledge is able to steal car then. Today you need electronic equipment and some extensive knowledge. Is it easy to break ….. in some old models yes in new ones not so easy. Every year car manufactures ad layers of electronic and mechanical protection, thieves need some time to crack that. Also model of car is important if car is expensive then protection is heavy if car is cheap or old you can break it easily but it is not worth it. It is not easy to crack good electronic lock without knowledge and good equipment.
